commits.author: Mike McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Renames {@code source} to {@code dest} as an atomic operation, * where {@code dest} does not yet exist in the directory. *

* Notes: This method is used by IndexWriter to publish commits. * It is ok if this operation is not truly atomic, for example * both {@code source} and {@code dest} can be visible temporarily. * It is just important that the contents of {@code dest} appear * atomically, or an exception is thrown. */ public abstract void rename(String source, String dest) throws IOException;

commits.author: Kevin Risden
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Renames {@code source} to {@code dest} as an atomic operation, * where {@code dest} does not yet exist in the directory. *

* Notes: This method is used by IndexWriter to publish commits. * It is ok if this operation is not truly atomic, for example * both {@code source} and {@code dest} can be visible temporarily. * It is just important that the contents of {@code dest} appear * atomically, or an exception is thrown. */ public abstract void rename(String source, String dest) throws IOException;

commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew:
/**
   * Renames {@code source} file to {@code dest} file where
   * {@code dest} must not already exist in the directory.
   *
   * It is permitted for this operation to not be truly atomic, for example
   * both {@code source} and {@code dest} can be visible temporarily in {@link #listAll()}.
   * However, the implementation of this method must ensure the content of
   * {@code dest} appears as the entire {@code source} atomically. So once
   * {@code dest} is visible for readers, the entire content of previous {@code source}
   * is visible.
   *
   * This method is used by IndexWriter to publish commits.
   */
  public abstract void rename(String source, String dest) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld:
/** * Renames {@code source} to {@code dest} as an atomic operation, * where {@code dest} does not yet exist in the directory. *

* Notes: This method is used by IndexWriter to publish commits. * It is ok if this operation is not truly atomic, for example * both {@code source} and {@code dest} can be visible temporarily. * It is just important that the contents of {@code dest} appear * atomically, or an exception is thrown. */ public abstract void rename(String source, String dest) throws IOException;
